Words from our HOD
We have a vision to make the most ideal environment for the students to have a quality insight in Computer Science and to structure them for a globalized technical society. We educate the students to be fruitful, moral, capable issue solvers and deep rooted for contributing emphatically to the nation through Computer education. Computers and Technology are the Future and Our Students are the future of our Nation.
